name: Rakesh Nandakumar
title: Software Engineer
Technical Consultant
Lecturer
Freelancer
shortBio: I'm a skilled full-stack developer with 3+ years of experience, specializing in creating dynamic, user-centric applications with Laravel, React, Vue.js, and more.
longBio:
I'm a skilled full-stack developer with over 3 years of professional experience in creating dynamic, user-centric applications. My technical expertise spans Laravel, React, Vue.js, Tailwind CSS, and more, allowing me to design and develop comprehensive web solutions for both local and international clients.

Throughout my career at Webrubix IT Consulting Canada and Procons Infotech, I've worked on multiple platforms and enterprise-level systems, implementing REST APIs, developing front-end features, and ensuring seamless integration between services. I'm proficient in cloud technologies like AWS, utilizing EC2, S3, and Lambda for scalable solutions.

Committed to continuous learning and delivering clean, efficient code, I focus on enhancing application performance and security through routine code reviews. My experience includes multi-vendor applications, SaaS solutions, and mobile app development with React Native. When I'm not coding, you might find me mentoring at hackathons or organizing technical workshops.

education.institution: Asia Pacific Institute of Information Technology

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Design and develop various web and enterprise-level software solutions for local and foreign clients, including government contracts. Build with Laravel, JQuery, Bootstrap, and AWS services (EC2, S3). Implement back-end systems, create APIs for mobile apps, and collaborate with cross-functional teams.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Designed and developed web solutions for local and foreign clients. Worked on multiple platforms based on Laravel and Filament PHP, including a multi-vendor application. Developed front-end features using React JS, Vue JS, Tailwind, and React Native. Implemented REST APIs and maintained version control using Git.

experience.title: Technical Consultant
experience.description: Provide consulting services for full-stack web application development, enterprise-level system development, mobile app development with React Native, and Chrome extensions development.

techStack.name: Laravel
techStack.description: Strong expertise in building scalable backends and APIs with Laravel, using features like authentication, middleware, and Eloquent ORM.

techStack.name: Next.js
techStack.description: Expert in full-stack development with Next.js, leveraging SSR, static generation, and API routes for high-performance apps.

techStack.name: ASP.NET
techStack.description: Strong experience in developing secure, scalable enterprise apps with ASP.NET and integrating cloud-based services.

techStack.name: WordPress
techStack.description: Expert in WordPress development, including custom themes, plugins, WooCommerce, and performance optimization.

techStack.name: React Native
techStack.description: Expert in building cross-platform mobile apps with React Native, ensuring smooth performance on iOS and Android.

techStack.name: AWS
techStack.description: Extensive experience deploying and managing cloud solutions using AWS services like EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, and IAM.

techStack.name: JavaScript Frameworks
techStack.description: Strong proficiency in Vue.js, Alpine.js, and jQuery for building dynamic, responsive front-end components.

techStack.name: Raspberry Pi
techStack.description: Hands-on experience using Raspberry Pi for IoT, automation, and educational projects with hardware integration.

techStack.name: ChatGPT
techStack.description: Strong experience integrating ChatGPT for chatbots, AI-powered analytics, content generation, and support automation.

timeline.title: Software Engineer at Procons Infotech

timeline.description: Designed and developed web solutions for local and foreign clients using Laravel, React.js, Vue.js, and React Native

projects.title: APIIT Lanka Students Blog
projects.description: Built using Laravel, Livewire, Alpine JS and Filament PHP, with multiple user panels with Filament for different admin users. Implemented SEO strategies to improve visibility and search engine ranking. Deployed using Forge.
projects.impact: Streamlined the student blogging platform, fostering enhanced communication and collaboration within the APIIT community

projects.title: Book Re-Sale Site
projects.description: Developed a tailored system for selling used books, using Laravel and Jetstream with Inertia.js and Vue.js for the admin panel, designed as a single-page application (SPA). Implemented SEO strategies to improve visibility.
projects.impact: Vital solution in Sri Lanka's educational landscape, offering accessible educational materials amidst economic challenges, reducing financial barriers, and promoting textbook sustainability

projects.title: SaaS Platform with OpenAI API Integration
projects.description: Developed a SaaS project using Laravel 11, Tailwind CSS, and Stripe Online Payments. Provided users with credits upon registration and integrated a chat feature using the OpenAI API, with each interaction consuming credits.
projects.impact: Delivered a flexible, scalable platform with advanced AI features and secure transactions, enhancing user interaction and experience
